name: Dropback
headline: The front office software suite for college sports
description:
Dropback is building front office software for the future of college sports. We help major athletic departments manage their teams' "salary caps" and roster limits to construct their most competitive rosters.

Just two years ago, it became legal for athletes to earn an income beyond their scholarships. Since then, despite college athletes earning $2B+, rapid regulation change has put college sports in disarray. Dropback brings order to this chaos through custom compensation frameworks, roster management, what-if playgrounds, and more--ultimately helping elite programs optimize spend & maximize talent.

founders.name: Luke Bogus, Co-Founder
founders.description: Before Dropback, Luke was Head of Product for Vial, a Series B life science tech startup, helping zero-to-one new clinical trial infrastructure that now generates millions in ARR. Prior, Luke was a Product Manager at Microsoft, and studied computer science and marketing at Nebraska's Raikes School.

founders.name: Nick Siscoe, Founder
founders.description: Building tech to power the front office of elite college sports teams @ dropback.com

## Everything you need for revenue sharing. One, private, pro-grade system.
Power 4 Programs use Dropback to create and monitor budgets, build data-driven cap strategies, and automate contracts & payroll.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6765ae74882175bf8d1ad94b/6786776ffa474fa0ab4c544b_add-money-circle-stroke-rounded.svg)
Athlete valuations
Defensible, data-driven contract values.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6765ae74882175bf8d1ad94b/6786776ffbd3fdeae2290746_drag-04-stroke-rounded.svg)
Roster construction
Optimize talent, depth, and dollars.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6765ae74882175bf8d1ad94b/6786776f8b1314096292e46f_contracts-stroke-rounded.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6765ae74882175bf8d1ad94b/6786776f6998111af59671f9_analysis-text-link-stroke-rounded.svg)
Cap management
Monitor spend against internal & league rules.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6765ae74882175bf8d1ad94b/6786776fd076c15707fdbbdf_pen-tool-03-stroke-rounded.svg)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6765ae74882175bf8d1ad94b/6786776f93489c2e260f8eaa_football-pitch-stroke-rounded.svg)

## Built by a world-class engineering team
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6765ae74882175bf8d1ad94b/678936a79867fcc2f97cac79_HudlWhite.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6765ae74882175bf8d1ad94b/6778363e62f5533326a536ed_yc_white.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6765ae74882175bf8d1ad94b/6789366596ef940887929a83_microsoft%2Blogo%2Bwhite.png)
## Built for **GMs & Coaches**
## Front Office Strategy
Transform athlete evaluations into roster valuations through **build-your-own, data-driven formulas** for effective and defensible valuations.
Collaborate across GM, Personnel, and Admin to build your most competitive roster against budget.
[See it in action![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6765ae74882175bf8d1ad94b/677fe0de892218c3c9604355_67406a8af60aea1c4b5bd53c_arrow-right-line%2520\(1\).svg.svg)](https://www.dropback.com/<#front-office-1>)

## Built for **ADs & Admins**
## Back Office Automation
Generate contracts automatically, auto-filling your custom templates with athlete-specific terms and budget allocations.
Automate pay schedule creation directly from contracts, and same-day direct deposit to any account‚Äîwith no % fees.

## Save hours with Dropback
Increase savings and automate busy work by managing _budgets_ , _contracts_ , and _payroll_ in one place.
### "I'm spending more time scouting and less time copy-pasting in Word & Excel."
Power 4 General Manager
Allocate custom budgets
Distribute capital across any sport, with custom rules and unlimited custom budget pools.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6765ae74882175bf8d1ad94b/677fab93de8ce3980a002008_Screenshot%202024-09-13%20at%205.46.45%E2%80%AFPM%201.png)

generated_description:
### Dropback: The Future of College Sports Management

**Founded**: 2024  
**Location**: Roeland Park, KS  
**Team Size**: 2  
**Y Combinator Batch**: W24

---

#### Mission
Dropback provides an innovative front office software suite specifically designed for college sports. The platform aims to help athletic departments efficiently manage their teams' roster limits and salary caps, enabling them to build competitive rosters.

---

#### Context
In 2021, the landscape of college athletics changed dramatically when it became legal for athletes to earn an income beyond their scholarships. This move unleashed a financial wave‚Äîover $2 billion flowing into the hands of athletes. However, it also created a chaotic regulatory environment. Enter Dropback, which brings order to this newfound complexity. With customized compensation frameworks and roster management tools, Dropback assists elite programs in optimizing spending while maximizing talent.

---

#### Features
Dropback combines both back office operations and front office strategy through its all-in-one tech stack. Here's what they offer:

- **Custom Compensation Structures**: Tailor contracts and payout schedules that fit your program's financial strategies.
- **Roster Management**: Create and manage dynamic and competitive rosters across various sports.
- **What-If Scenarios**: Experiment with different strategies for roster construction and salary cap management to see what will give you the best edge.
- **Budget Monitoring**: Track spending against both internal targets and league rules for compliance.
- **Data-Driven Insights**: Utilize analytics to make informed decisions when valuing athletes and assessing team needs.
  
With these tools, Dropback allows general managers and coaches to collaborate effectively, putting data at the forefront of talent evaluation and roster planning.

---

#### Key People
- **Group Partner**: Dalton Caldwell, an experienced figure in driving growth and innovation within the sports-tech space.

---

#### Tags
Dropback is categorized under sports-tech, finance, HR-tech, and operations, showcasing its broad applicability and focus on enhancing performance through technology.

---

#### Future Vision
As college athletics continues to evolve, tools like Dropback are essential for programs aiming to stay competitive while navigating a complex financial landscape. Their recent fundraising efforts of **$1.6 million** indicate a strong belief in their vision and potential for scalability.

For more information or to see Dropback in action, check out their website: [Dropback](https://www.dropback.com).

---

In a world where every dollar and every athlete counts, Dropback is charting a path towards smarter, data-driven decision-making in college sports. It‚Äôs refreshing to see tech helping athletic departments adapt to the changing game‚Äîafter all, when talent meets efficient management, great things can happen.
